content: this legal text explains the progress of a divorce case between mr and mrs the parties have expressed their wish to proceed with a divorce by mutual consent they have agreed on the division of their rights and property including personal belongings financial accounts and debts mrs has been assigned the immovable property the agreement also addresses coownership postintervention files and the repayment of a debt in terms of their children the main residence will be with the mother but the children will spend weekends with the father both parents will jointly exercise parental authority and contribute to the costs of living and upbringing the agreement is made in accordance with the civil code there is also a provision for wage authorization to ensure maintenance payments the parties are informed about the maintenance claims service the divorce becomes binding once the marriage certificate is notified and the divorce decree is forwarded via the registry court the parties confirm their satisfaction with an electronic copy of the deed
